name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip
description: Tired of seeing the same old apple come back, uneaten, day after day in your kid’s lunchbox? Time to make a change! Send your kids to school with Summer Berry Sweet Dip and cut up fruit and never see an apple come back home again!
preparation: Combine sweet dip mix and yogurt. Let stand 10 minutes.
tips: Serve with your favorite fruit for dipping, or use to top pancakes, granola, and fruit salad with prepared dip.
Freeze for decadent ice pops, or between two cookies for “ice cream” sandwiches.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.
